title: Streisand: Her Life
description: A riveting biography of one of the greatest stars in Hollywood and music history, STREISAND is about the woman who conquered Broadway, the recording industry, television and the movies by the age of twenty-six and has been largely hiding from the public ever since. Based on hundreds of interviews with Barbraâ€™s family and associates, and unprecedented behind-the-scenes information, this is the definitive Streisand biography.
author: James Spada
